definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly

sentences.english: He began poor, panhandled , ended in jail.
sentences.chinese: 他開始受窮，行乞，最後坐牢。

sentences.english: He would rather be poor than get money in such a dishonest way.
sentences.chinese: 他說他寧願受窮也不願以這種方法獲取錢財。

sentences.english: The days when we were poor are gone forever.
sentences.chinese: 我們受窮的日子一去不復返了。

sentences.english: Haves difference is big, good choose not poor.
sentences.chinese: 窮富差別大，善擇不受窮。

sentences.english: He who will not economize will have to agonize.
sentences.chinese: 關於節儉的，大意是如果不節儉，就會受窮。

sentences.english: IT prefers to be ugly ratIT dawn get cash in love that a way.
sentences.chinese: 她寧願受窮也不願以這種技巧掙錢。

sentences.english: The rich continue to get richer, while everyone else suffers.
sentences.chinese: 富人變得更富有，其他人都在受窮。

sentences.english: The elder, she said, runs off with the riches, leaving the younger impoverished and embittered.
sentences.chinese: 她說，大哥帶着金銀財寶走了，留下了弟弟受苦受窮。
